name: Spookware - At the hospital!
description:
WELCOME

This game is a small fangame based off spookware, an amazing set of 60 microgames all wrapped up in this open world adventure. SPOOKWARE on Steam (steampowered.com) 

I've decided to make something dedicated to the team behind spookware as a thanks for making something I really enjoyed. In this game you'll be joining Left, Midi and Righty on a trip to the hospital, before the events of the main steam release. There's 9 Spacebar hitting microgames that even includes a special boss microgame!

CONTROLS 

Space - Start, Go through dialogue, Play microgames 

SOCIALS
